title: Hippos might be ferocious fighters, but their big teeth make them terrible chewers
description: Among plant eaters, hippos are the worst chewers. Their huge tusks and front teeth keep the jaw from moving side to side to grind food, a study finds.

title: The development of quantum dots wins the 2023 Nobel prize in chemistry
description: Moungi Bawendi, Louis Brus and Alexei Ekimov split the prize for their work in creating nanoparticles whose properties depend on their size.

title: A global report finds amphibians are still in peril. But it’s not all bad news
description: A survey of about 8,000 amphibian species provides the latest update on extinction risk trends stretching back to 1980.
